QuestData.Title: The Black Shield
QuestData.Description: Ah, I remember now! Mosarn is a well-respected blacksmith in Thunder Bluff. I knew I had heard his name somewhere, before.$b$bIn thanks, the Earthen Ring awarded me with a set of armor crafted by Mosarn. Very good work.$b$bPerhaps he can tell you more about the shield he crafted.$b$bIt's not much of a lead, but since we didn't get anything useful out of Reethe, it's all we have.
QuestData.LogDescription: Show the Blackened Iron Shield to Mosarn in Thunder Bluff.
QuestData.CompletionText: Hello there, $c. Something I can help you with?
QuestData.RewardText: Yes, you are certainly correct. This is a shield that I made.$b$bI'm afraid there's not much more I can tell you though, $n. I craft so many different shields and sets of armor, I can't keep track of them all.
